headline: GameStop Did It. Now Strive's Matt Cole Wants Intuit to Back Bitcoin Too
summary: Intuit’s deplatforming and anti-bitcoin stance could harm shareholder value, Cole said, while urging adoption of BTC as a strategic hedge.
